definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
an outsider can see things more clearly or objectively than those involved (idiom)
pinyin: dang1 ju2 zhe3 mi2 , pang2 guan1 zhe3 qing1

sentences.english: The leaders of the city always boast that the city is the most suitable place for human beings to live.
sentences.chinese: 海口市当局总是吹嘘这个城市最适合人类居住。

sentences.english: Was it ignorance by provincial authorities or was it that they neglected to report it?
sentences.chinese: 是省当局的无知还是漏报？

sentences.english: entered into an advertising dalliance with Google, but this fell apart after antitrust authorities signalled that they would not approve such an agreement.
sentences.chinese: 但是因反托马斯当局的不赞成，他们的联盟落空。

sentences.english: I am afraid that his attitude to authority unfits him for work on this project.
sentences.chinese: 我但心他对当局的态度使他不能胜任这个项目。

sentences.english: The Swedish authorities are the first in Europe to develop such recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典当局是欧洲第一个提出这种建议的国家。

sentences.english: The flood forecasting division gives authorities 24-hour warning of monsoon flooding.
sentences.chinese: 洪水预报部门为当局提供了24小时季风洪水预警。

sentences.english: She said that Vietnamese authorities are evaluating the events in Hue.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，越南当局正在评估顺化所发生的事件。

sentences.english: So do all who live to see such times, but that is not for them to decide.
sentences.chinese: 当局者迷，你可能并不知道该是换新工作的时候了。

sentences.english: Various initiatives continue to be implemented to reduce the risk of landslides.
sentences.chinese: 当局继续推行各项新措施，以减低山泥倾泻的风险。

sentences.english: It also shows the Iranian authorities that people care and won't let them be forgotten," said Laura Fattal, mother of Josh Fattal.
sentences.chinese: 同时表明人民关心的伊朗当局不会让他们被遗忘”。

sentences.english: The drivers in Gansu agreed to end their strike after the authorities promised to crack down on unlicensed taxis.
sentences.chinese: 甘肃司机同意，当局承诺打击无照黑车后，结束罢工。

sentences.english: Fifteen rainstorm warnings have been issued by Hubei authorities.
sentences.chinese: 湖北当局已发出十五条暴雨警告。

sentences.english: Did the authorities kill them because they'd eaten human flesh?
sentences.chinese: 当局有没有因为它们吃了人肉而把它们杀掉？

sentences.english: In communicating the level of alarm, authorities need to be able to move down as well as up.
sentences.chinese: 在通报警戒级别时，各方当局需能做出上下调整。

sentences.english: It had not received any legal notices from Chinese authorities.
sentences.chinese: 他们并没有收到中国当局的任何法律传票。

definition: DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan)/abbr. for 民主進步黨|民主进步党
Tsai Ing-wen (1956-), Taiwanese DPP politician, president of the Republic of China from 2016
Executive Yuan, the executive branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
Mainland Affairs Council (Taiwan), abbr. for 大陸委員會|大陆委员会
Nationalist government 1920s-1949 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
British colonial administration of Hong Kong 1837-1941 and 1945-1997
Lee Teng-hui (1923-2020), Taiwanese politician, president of ROC 1988-2000
